petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused is present. Judgment delivered in the open court. The prosecution has failed to prove it&amp#039s case u/s 366(A)/343/376 I.P.C and section 6 of POCSO Act against the accused beyond all reasonable doubt.Held, the accused not guilty u/s 366(A)/343/376 I.P.C and section 6 of POCSO ActAccordingly, accused is acquitted and set at liberty. The bail bond of accused stands cancelled and the bailor is discharged from all liabilities. The case is disposed of.
